dn29:2.4: Vadhoyeva kho → vadhoyeveko (mr), vattati → anuvattati (s1-3, mr)
dn29:2.5: tepi → te tesu (mr), nibbinnarūpā → nibiṇṇarūpā (pts1) | nibbindarūpā (mr)
dn29:9.5: satthā ca te → satthā ca te arahaṃ (s1-3, pts1)
dn29:21.12: paripūraṃ → pari­suddha­taraṃ (bj, s1-3, mr) | paripūrataraṃ (?), hetaṃ passati → na passatīti (s1-3, mr)
dn29:54.2: tathā → tattha (bj, s1-3, mr), byākātabbā, kiṃ vo ahaṃ te → kiṃ te ahante aññatitthiye (s2, s3) | kiṃ no ahaṃ (pts1)
dn29:56.28: tathā → tattha (bj, s2, s3, pts1), byākarissāmi → byākarissāmīti (bj, c1) | vyākarissāmi (pts1)
dn29:57.2: byākātabbā, kiṃ vo ahaṃ te tathā → kiṃ vo ahaṃ te tattha (bj) | kiṃ te ahaṃ te tattha (s2, s3)
